wiki.content: The What You Want Songfacts reports that Evanescence frontwoman Amy Lee penned the song at her house in New York with bassist Tim McCord and guitarist Terry Balsamo. She told MTV News: "We were just jamming, like, recording demos, and obviously the song has grown a lot since then, with everyone else. For me, it was — and I need to remember this, so I can apply it in the future — it wasn't trying so hard to be some epic, massive chorus. I was just doodling around on the piano and the guys were like, 'Do that. Whatever you just did, that's an awesome melody.' And I was like, 'Really?' Sometimes you just need your friends to be like, 'Do that!'" User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The What You Want Songfacts reports that Evanescence frontwoman Amy Lee penned the song at her house in New York with bassist Tim McCord and guitarist Terry Balsamo. She told MTV News: "We were just jamming, like, recording demos, and obviously the song has grown a lot since then, with everyone else. For me, it was — and I need to remember this, so I can apply it in the future — it wasn't trying so hard to be some epic, massive chorus.

track.name: What You Want
comments: burası çok güzel ya "We’re forever spiraling down, down, down, down" düşüyomuş gibi hissettim
"Do what you want ‘til you find what you’re looking for (got to remember who you really are) "  "aradığını bulana dek ne halin varsa gör ama gerçekte kim olduğunu hatırla"
albümdeki en iyi şarkısı. "Somewhere beyond the pain there must be a way to learn forgiveness"

Cheguei atrasado, comprei o ingresso as pressas, qnd cheguei nas catracas ouvi a beteria começar, entrei correndo, em meio a mutidão e as luzes azuis, pra ver minha banda preferida. <3 Sinto toda aquela adrenalina e emoção quando ouço essa música. Uma dos melhores momentos da minha vida ♥

(remember who you really are)
